features: FUNCTIONAL: Double-sided 360 degree rotating mirror for placing on vanity or countertop.
MAGNIFICATION: 1x and 7x magnification mirrors for close-up grooming, makeup application, skin care and more.
SHAPE: Rectangle shape with wide base ensures mirror stays upright.
STYLE: Non-slip rubberized soft touch finish in a sleek matte black color
SIZE: Sits 6.75" wide, stands 8" tall, making this mirror an ideal size for any countertop
body.description: This Soft Touch Rectangular Vanity Mirror comes with in a sleek matte black finish and includes 1x and 7x magnification views. Mirror rotates 360 degrees for easy use.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Function and Form Danielle's mirrors feature the highest quality optical glass for a distortion-free image of unparalleled sharpness and clarity. Danielle's collection of mirrors encompasses every style and every need. With endless amounts of unique styles, magnifications and uses, choosing a beauty mirror has never been a better experience. Danielle by Upper Canada Since 1987, Danielle has been offering a premium quality range of mirrors, cosmetic travel bags and beauty accessories. Our commitment to quality, service and value ensures a variety of high quality products for every need.

Danielle, an Upper Canada Brand Upper Canada is committed to combining tried and true traditions with the latest in innovation and technology to bring customers nothing but the finest in bath and body care. Upper Canada is committed to excellence, ingenuity and quality - and to delighting the senses! No products or ingredients are ever tested on animals.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great small mirror
reviews.reviewText: I needed a small mirror for my vanity and this is perfect. It is the perfect size and has a magnifying side and regular mirror side. It is easy to transport and looks visually appealing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and love the sleek design.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I need glasses to read so trying to put make up on is so hard. This mirror is wonderful. I have a magnifying mirror on the wall so this is my travel go to.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2014
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A decent mirror.
reviews.reviewText: Pros: This mirror feels sturdy. It stays in place when you position it. The surfaces are clear and unblemished. It has a somewhat slip free feel to the surface. - Slightly rubberized.Cons: Because of the way the magnifying side is shaped, it can be hard to find a focus point. Especially if you are trying to look at the side of your face (for example). It has no hole in the base for hanging on the wall, for a hook or screw. The pivot points are on the long sides of the rectangle - so it's more of an up and down view, than a side to side view. ( which I feel takes away from its usefulness ).I bought this as a replacement mirror. The mirror it replaced had a round magnifying side. I find the round preferable due to the even distortion around the sides. The magnification side on this mirror is rectangular, and the distortion is somewhat uneven.Over all not a bad mirror. Decent for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: An Airbnb we stayed at had this mirror in the master bathroom. I really liked the size and magnification. Thankfully the label was still on the bottom so I was able to find it on Amazon !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Smaller than I realized
reviews.reviewText: Smaller than I figured it to be. Magnification is so strong I can’t see in it. Wanted one larger and magnification to bring my face closer for putting on makeup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just the right size.
reviews.reviewText: Look this double sided mirror. Just the right size and strength for my needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 2, 2023

reviews.reviewText: Bom espelho. O lado do aumento é muito bom para fazer maquiagem.
This mirror is everything i wanted. Super good quality 🙌🏾🙌🏾

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 9, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: Very pleased to have found this mirror
reviews.reviewText: I'm so relieved to have found this mirror. I've been searching for ages for a freestanding rectangular mirror this size, suitable for the bathroom, but all the others I've ordered ended up being returned because the image wasn't quite true - not a huge distortion but I seem to notice it more than most people, and it was just enough to make my vision swim. This mirror gives a properly stable, clear reflection, and the magnifying side is also very useful for the occasional close up. The soft touch frame looks and feels nice, and the whole thing seems well made. It's a pleasure to use.

reviews.reviewTitle: Good size and easy to travel with
reviews.reviewText: I am very happy with my travel mirror. I has 2 sides - one magnified and one normal. The outside of it is almost non slip and its easy to pack in a suitcase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 8, 2016
reviews.reviewText: Excellent lightweight yet sturdy mirror, bought to take on holiday. My eyesight isn't good enough for the application of make-up anymore but the 7x magnification is perfect for this and the actual mirror area is quite large. Thrilled with it and would recommend, though not cheap. Delivery was prompt and it came well packaged.
